item.name: Headphones
item.description: * After succeeding at a FINAID check (empathy, perception, or danger sense), but before finding out the results, you may instead fail the check. * If you do: * Take the card that you succeeded the check with, and place it face-down on Headphones. * Headphones can hold up to 3 cards. * At the start of combat: * Reveal all cards on Headphones and add them to your hand. * Headphones can also be used to make a loud place quiet (perhaps allowing for a more restful sleep).
item.flavor: These large, foamy, deluxe, bass-forward noise-cancelling headphones are exactly what you need to drown out Paradise Lua.
